entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add GetMultipleFiles() method to InputFileChangeEventArgs and specify exceptions thrown. #40341
  • Duplicate scopes sent to IdP for OIDC authentication from WebAssembly #40340
  • Investigate using WebSocketStream in SignalR browser JS client #40339
  • Unable to run TestServer requests in parallel #40337
  • Blazor server DelegatingHandler for http client causing JavaScript error with prerendering disabled #40336
    Backlog
  • SDK 6.0.200 breaks Blazor projects in Azure DevOps Visual Studio build task #40333
  • BLAZOR WASM - ADFS - OIDC - Documentation #40331
  • When adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing to test project, dotnet publish --no-build command fails with NETSDK1085 #40330
  • Create 6.0 BlazorWebAssemblyApp project with the command and run the "dotnet publish" command, for the first time meet error:'MSB4018: The "GetFileHash" task failed unexpectedly'. #40328
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cant use asp-for tag helpers with nullable model #40327
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • MarkupString not working and encode character & #40141
  • CacheTagHelper <cache> works for other elements but not for a particular view component? #40187
  • OnInitialized not being called for component inside RenderFragment after StateHasChanged on parent #40329
  • blazor wasm using new Claim("roles", role) cause @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "admin")] not work #40314
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor WASM Environnement issue #40146
  • Razor view CSS isolation does not support HTML header tag #40151
  • Similar to MarkupString but for custom components. #40311
  • Cannot Inject ApplicationUser into Controller .NET CORE6 #40117
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Add LinkerTest project #40342
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0e40217` to `c9461a9` #40332
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Add EndpointMetadataCollection.GetRequiredMetadata #39921 #40321
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Added reference to the Deveel's MongoDB #40323
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add a switch to defer rendering of components in ComponentTagHelper #40316
    area-blazor
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Input components two way binding #40234
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
